title: Still no IP/RP on PBE account
body: It's been a couple weeks and I still haven't received the RP or IP

replies.body:
Howdy Pookie,

It looks like your account has IP and RP on the PBE. You should try logging out and logging back in as it may be a display issue.

It seems like the PBE servers are down, and are you checking for pookiefx2 on the PBE?
I will check when they are back up, as well as I cannot get on the PBE Forums "Unable to retrieve discussions"
That is the account that I checked out. The PBE and the PBE boards are currently down for maintenance.
Now I have it it seems that i had to play 1 game to see the rp and ip
Just go to the store and purchace something even though it says 0 its there trust nme youll get 100k ip and 40krp
